Articles.Content:
So here it is, sitting the in VAB waiting for me to build something to throw it at the sun with.

Features!

Space for 11 crew

4 monopropellant tanks

8 rechargeable battery packs

8 small solar panels

2 big solar panels

Science lab

4 docking ports for extra modules

and 4 lights for when you its on the dark side of whatever planet it is orbiting

So what do you think? Will it fail? Will it work? Honestly I have no clue.

Feel free to post suggestions for the space station and for a launching-module-thing
